channel.title: reinforcement learning on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in reinforcement learning on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: Space Navigator
item.description: TL; DR A system for calculating optimal collision avoidance maneuvers for satellites based on reinforcement learning. About We made Space Navigator - a system for automatically determining the probability of collision of space objects and calculating the most effective evasive maneuver using AI. Stage of the project: Research Article “Space Navigator: a Tool for the Optimization of Collision Avoidance Maneuvers” (2020) MVP (2019) First place in the competition of projects of the Academy of Roscosmos (presentation slides, 2018) VR presentation (2018) Demonstrations and reports:

item.title: Art Exhibition: Game Junction
item.description: Exhibition “Game Junction” exhibition in the gallery Khodynka with For All Exists Infinity project. Some details Read more here.

item.title: Poker Robot
item.description: TL; DR Researching and applying the Reinforcement Learning approach to no-limit Texas poker. Fragment of one of the experiments. My role Application of existing models Implementation of the pipeline of experiments and comparison of models Development of architectural features of the poker environment experiments Experiments

item.title: Marketing Robot
item.description: TL; DR Outsourcing R&D project for the Retentioneering company – Reinforcement Learning for automatic budget management for advertising campaigns. We managed to create a quality MVP. NDA. Yandex Direct img. My team Me. Olga – MEPhI graduate, postgraduate student of the Institute of Theoretical and Experimental Physics (ITEP) in elementary particle physics, machine learning specialist, programmer.. My role Searching for a client Management Programming (python) Environment Reinforcement Learning Simulator … Statistical analysis of approaches, selection and analysis of metrics

item.title: Anomaly Prediction
item.description: TL; DR Application of Neural Networks, Machine Learning algorithms, Reinforcement Learning and Natural Language Processing for Detection / Prediction of Anomalies in Storage Area Network by log data. Also, development and testing researched methods for improving Digital Twin of Storage Area Network, methods on chaotic systems, OpenAI Gym wrappers. Research Article “Online detection of failures generated by storage simulator” (2021) Research Article “SANgo: a storage infrastructure simulator with reinforcement learning support” (2020) Experiments and intermediate results Photo by Denny Müller on Unsplash

item.title: Hackathon: RL Hackathon, A!ONE
item.description: I participated in the Reinforcement Learning hackathon from MTS at the A!ONE conference. It was required to develop an agent for a slightly modified CarRacing-v0 OpenAI GYM environment.
